name: semanajsexpert-6.0
description: Seja bem vindo(a) à sexta Semana Javascript Expert. Este é o código inicial para iniciar nossa jornada.

scripts.test: set LOG_DISABLED=true && set NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules --no-warnings && npx jest --runInBand --no-cache
scripts.test:watch: set LOG_DISABLED=true && set NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules --no-warnings && npx jest --runInBand --no-cache --watchAll
scripts.test:coverage: set LOG_DISABLED=true && set NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules --no-warnings && npx jest --runInBand --no-cache --coverage tests/unit

author: Gustavo Alexandre da Silva Carvalho
